column12: to mr. willie c. and mrs. bertha rainey. dr. rainey departed this life on june 6
column13: 2015. he was preceded in death by his parents and a son
column14: justin von rainey. ravon and j. dollie lee were married on october 6
column15: 1969. he served in the united states air force from 1967-1978
column16: receiving an honorable discharge. he retired from the federal government in 2007
column17: after a total of thirty-eight years of employment. he was an assistant pastor of victorious life church and the founder/president of victorious life bible institute. he earned his doctorate in christian education & theology from faith bible college. dr. ravon rainey leaves to cherish his memories
